description:
Anne Seeing is http://anidb.net/ch12080 [Lag]`s mother. She was kidnapped to the capital of the AmberGround, Akatsuki.
She is later revealed to have been from the royal bloodline, and is now part of the machine continuing to keep the man-made sun lit. During the Day of Flicker, a fragment of heart hit her, causing an accelerated pregnancy within minutes. What was born was a boy being of pure heart; to keep him from fading, Anne had http://anidb.net/ch12410 [Sabrina Mary] place a Spirit Amber in his eye socket. This gave the boy human form, and Anne named him Lag.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Anne Seeing
